languages.text: "Радуйся, что ты здесь, а не в одном из изолированных поселков. У меня дядя из такого сбежал... от того, что рассказывает, волосы на голове шевелятся".

traits.locale_text: "Радуйся, что ты здесь, а не в одном из изолированных поселков. У меня дядя из такого сбежал... от того, что рассказывает, волосы на голове шевелятся".

languages.text: "Be glad you're here and not in one of the isolated settlements. My uncle ran away from one... he told me things that made my hair stand on end."
languages.original_text: "Радуйся, что ты здесь, а не в одном из изолированных поселков. У меня дядя из такого сбежал... от того, что рассказывает, волосы на голове шевелятся".

traits.locale_text: "Be glad you're here and not in one of the isolated settlements. My uncle ran away from one... he told me things that made my hair stand on end."
"Be glad you're here and not in one of the isolated settlements. My uncle ran away from one... he told me things that made my hair stand on end."
"Be glad you're here and not in one of the isolated settlements. My uncle ran away from one... he told me things that made my hair stand on end."
"Be glad you're here and not in one of the isolated settlements. My uncle ran away from one... he told me things that made my hair stand on end."
"Be glad you're here and not in one of the isolated settlements. My uncle ran away from one... he told me things that made my hair stand on end."

languages.text: “庆幸吧，还好你是在这里，不是在别的什么离群索居的定居点。我叔叔从一个地方逃了出来……他和我说的那些事情，吓得我寒毛都立起来了。”
languages.original_text: "Be glad you're here and not in one of the isolated settlements. My uncle ran away from one... he told me things that made my hair stand on end."

traits.locale_text: “庆幸吧，还好你是在这里，不是在别的什么离群索居的定居点。我叔叔从一个地方逃了出来……他和我说的那些事情，吓得我寒毛都立起来了。”

languages.text: «Alégrate de estar aquí y no en uno de los asentamientos aislados. Mi tío huyó de uno... Aún se me ponen los pelos de punta al recordar sus historias».
languages.original_text: "Be glad you're here and not in one of the isolated settlements. My uncle ran away from one... he told me things that made my hair stand on end."

traits.locale_text: «Alégrate de estar aquí y no en uno de los asentamientos aislados. Mi tío huyó de uno... Aún se me ponen los pelos de punta al recordar sus historias».

languages.text: 「ここに来てもらえたってことは孤立集落にはなってないんだな、よかった。私のおじは出てったよ…髪が逆立つようなムカつく話を延々とされたんだ」
languages.original_text: "Be glad you're here and not in one of the isolated settlements. My uncle ran away from one... he told me things that made my hair stand on end."

traits.locale_text: 「ここに来てもらえたってことは孤立集落にはなってないんだな、よかった。私のおじは出てったよ…髪が逆立つようなムカつく話を延々とされたんだ」

languages.text: "Seid froh, dass Ihr hier seid und nicht in einer der isolierten Ansiedlungen. Mein Onkel ist aus so einer geflohen ... und hat mir Dinge erzählt, dass mir die Haare zu Berge standen."
languages.original_text: "Be glad you're here and not in one of the isolated settlements. My uncle ran away from one... he told me things that made my hair stand on end."

traits.locale_text: "Seid froh, dass Ihr hier seid und nicht in einer der isolierten Ansiedlungen. Mein Onkel ist aus so einer geflohen ... und hat mir Dinge erzählt, dass mir die Haare zu Berge standen."

languages.text: « Je préfère être ici que dans les villages isolés. Mon oncle s'est enfui d'un endroit de ce genre... Il m'a raconté des trucs qui font froid dans le dos. »
languages.original_text: "Be glad you're here and not in one of the isolated settlements. My uncle ran away from one... he told me things that made my hair stand on end."

traits.locale_text: « Je préfère être ici que dans les villages isolés. Mon oncle s'est enfui d'un endroit de ce genre... Il m'a raconté des trucs qui font froid dans le dos. »

languages.text: "Şu izbe yerleşim yerlerinden birinde değil de burada olduğuna şükret. Amcam kaçmıştı birinden, anlattıkları şeyler tüylerimi nasıl diken diken etti bir bilsen."
languages.original_text: "Be glad you're here and not in one of the isolated settlements. My uncle ran away from one... he told me things that made my hair stand on end."

traits.locale_text: "Şu izbe yerleşim yerlerinden birinde değil de burada olduğuna şükret. Amcam kaçmıştı birinden, anlattıkları şeyler tüylerimi nasıl diken diken etti bir bilsen."
